title: E-soft DJ Studio Pro v3.0.5.1 - Clean
description:
DJ Studio Pro
The ultimate audio player!
Great for parties, clubs etc.
Plays all file types including MP3, Windows  Media Audio, Real Player, Apple QuickTime and Ogg Vorbis.

Plays all file types - Instantly loads tracks from CD to memory -  Twin deck mixer player.
Sound clips can be played over current song or when fading between songs.
Over 100 free sound clips can be downloaded from our download page.
Manual & automatic variable speed fading between decks - Adjust speed without changing pitch.
Offset & Effect play buttons - Fade stop and fade down buttons.
Database with fast search & queue.
Song Memory - create offset start points for each song.
Separate headphones deck - Beat matching system.
Shows lyrics contained within MP3 files. (Add lyrics to MP3 files using our Audio Converter).
Plays all file types including MP3, WMA, M4A , AAC , MP4, OGG,  and CD
Supports M3U and PLS play lists.
CD track titles and album cover artwork retrieved automatically using the free CDDB service, and internet connection.
